subject: Thrustmaster t300 RS GT
description_text:
does your load cell pédalier fit on thrustmaster t3pa pédal kit?

Envoyé de mon appareil Samsung de Bell via le réseau le plus vaste au pays.

conversations.body_text: Hi Stéphane Roy,  If you are playing Steam games on a PC, the pedals are generally compatible with all wheel bases since they all connect to the computer via USB.
